sentence.Network_en: Twentieth - century Western woman is truly an androgynous creature.
sentence.Network_cn: 二十世纪的西方妇女确实是雌雄同体的生灵.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin androgynus (see androgyne) + -ous

entry.tran: （人、动物或植物）有两性特征的，雌雄同体的，雌雄同序的
entry.def: In biology, an androgynous person, animal, or plant has both male and female sexual characteristics.

entry.tran: 兼具两性的；双性并存的；男女不分的
entry.def: If you describe someone as androgynous, you mean that they are not distinctly masculine or feminine in appearance or in behaviour.

example.ex: Belinda was always attracted to men with an androgynous quality to them...
example.tran: 贝琳达常能以自己的中性特质令男人倾心。

means.word_mean: 1. having both male and female characteristics
